definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (brother of Melek, Ph. [[חמלך]], [[חמלכת]]; v. also [[אחיהו]] supr.)

priest in Saul's (Dvd's) time 1Sa 21:2, 1Sa 21:2, 1Sa 21:3, 1Sa 21:9, 1Sa 22:14; 1Sa 22:16 ([[אֲחִימֶָלֶךְ]] 1Ch 24:31, Ps 52:2 = (title); son of Ahitub 1Sa 22:9, 1Sa 22:11 (cf.1Sa 22:12); 1Sa 22:20; father of Abiathar 1Sa 23:6, 1Sa 30:7; so also 2Sa 8:17 SyrVer Ew We Th Dr; where MT ´[[בן־אביתר אחימ]]; whence id. wrongly 1Ch 24:6, cf. v:1Ch 24:4 ([[מִבְּנֵי אִיתָמָר]] ´[[אֲח]]) & 1Ch 18:16 (where rd. ´[[אֲח]] for ´[[אֲב]]).
